Kompis... Du verkar bara snacka en massa skit här "lonetree"... Vad i helvette gör du med din mobil... Om bara 3 vet vad du håller på med med. Aoooo.... I alla fall ring Turk5 på 08555555 om du behöver hjälp... eeaaa   du råkar inte ha en Joystick till min A1000??

Funkar prima ! Working perfect 
but how do I do ?
First flash by 54.08.00 as :
1) kill bouth Mrouter service in taskman Alt+Ctrl+Del
2) fully charge battery,switch off phone (remove SIM and memory card) sett battery back again shut down the phone and 
3) press both game buttons "o" and "oo" and hold them 
4) connect phone (game buttons are still pressed) with usb-cable and power cable (power in to usb first and then ) (DONÂ´T UNPLUG THE PHONE AT ANY TIME) 
5) let both game buttons go -> phone is showing something like "AP is on CE-Bus" 
6) run RSD lite 1.6 (if it is not already startet) 
6) Windows will probably find a new device (if you get an error message saying that the device was not correctly installed just shut down your PC and restart; after restart donÂ´t forget to kill the two mRouter tasks and run RSD lite 1.6 once again) 
7) click on "show device" 
8) select flash file 
9) click "start" 
10) during the flash process Windows will find 3 new devices; either select automatic driver installation or manually point to the MotPCSDrivers directory 

The first time I flashed my A1000 I got an error message after 100%: flashing failed (once again: DONÂ´T PANIC). If you get the same error message (DONÂ´T UNPLUG PHONE FROM USB CABLE) go on with 11) otherwise (if everything goes OK) go on with 16): 

11) close RSD lite 1.6 
12) switch off phone (1/0 switch on the right side of the phone) 
14) now you have to unplug phone from USB cable 
15) start from 3) once again (after the second time flashing succeeded) 
-- 
16) after flashing shows 100% phone will restart (DONÂ´T UNPLUG FROM USB CABLE) 
17) do all the initial settings (language, time etc.) 
18) RSD lite 1.5.1 will show: status finished; result PASS 
19) Now you may close RSD lite 1.6 und unplug USB cable

now restart your PC and do the copying explaind in readme file of the 54.08.09 and then flas it by doing all steps again.
the guide from http://www.a1k.it/indice.php?origine=http://www.a1k.it/about3077.html

förresten jag har en Tre låst A1000 vill ni låsa upp det kan ni kontakta mobilbanken.se ( jag har inga som helst ekonomiska intresse i detta tips det var bara svårt att hitta någon som kunde utföra det på min telefon som hade en hög version av bootloader)
f. a. n. det blev lite fel som jag skrevi jag hade (den är olåst nu) och ni som har en sådan kan bla bla .. ni vet
Kan man låsa upp mobilen med detta program?
